title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Effectiveness Evaluation of Technology-Based Learning Tools for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Science Education Theories and Instructional Technology Tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Six categories of educational technology tools applicable to science classes (knowledge/understanding tools, interaction/problem-solving tools, product-creation tools, efficiency/productivity tools, communication/collaboration tools, technology tutors) can be identified and classified.
The effectiveness of educational technology tools can be systematically evaluated by utilizing diverse data sources (learner performance data, usability assessments, feedback surveys).
Based on evaluation results, educational technology tools aligned with specific learning objectives of science lessons can be selected and integrated into PBL project designs.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
